text.0: wonderful let your coming be wondrous with help ye bounteous ones.
text.1: maruts who gleam as serpents gleam.
text.2: far be from us o maruts ye free givers your impetuous shaft.
text.3: far from us be the stone ye hurl.
text.4: o bounteous givers touch ye not o maruts tṛṇskandas folk.
text.5: lift ye us up that we may live.
